user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication with MFA.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system enabling secure user login through multi-factor authentication (MFA). The system should support credentials, one-time passwords, and security questions, ensuring compliance with industry standards for banking security. It must include password reset, session timeout, and device recognition features to enhance user experience and safety.

epics.title: Responsive and Modern User Interface
epics.summary: Design a responsive interface compatible with all devices.
epics.description: Design and develop a modern, intuitive, and fully responsive user interface ensuring seamless experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The design should follow accessibility guidelines, incorporate a consistent theme, and provide clear navigation structures for easy access to all services.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Display
epics.summary: Create a dashboard showing relevant products and services.
epics.description: Build a personalized dashboard that displays available banking products, services, and relevant information based on each customer's profile and eligibility. The content should adapt dynamically to the user's banking relationship, offering contextual recommendations and quick access to key features like account summaries and notifications.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Implement digital workflows for account requests and modifications.
epics.description: Develop streamlined workflows for submitting new account opening requests and service modification applications. Each workflow must minimize the number of required steps, validate user inputs in real-time, and integrate seamlessly with internal systems. Users should be able to track progress for each request and manage pending actions easily.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Set up live status tracking with email updates.
epics.description: Integrate real-time status updates for all user-submitted requests, providing instant visibility into progress. The system must send automated email notifications at each key milestone (submission, review, approval, or rejection). Notifications should comply with user preferences and include links to directly access request details.

epics.title: Document Upload and Application Draft Saving
epics.summary: Allow document uploads and saving of incomplete forms.
epics.description: Enable users to upload required documents securely within the self-service portal and support saving incomplete applications as drafts. The portal must store partially completed forms in an encrypted state and allow users to resume applications from any device without data loss or duplication issues.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank’s core systems.
epics.description: Design and implement seamless integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s existing core banking system. The integration must be real-time or near-real-time to synchronize customer data, transactions, and account details while ensuring minimal latency and maintaining data integrity.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization
epics.description: Develop a role-based access control (RBAC) framework that ensures users can only view and access features relevant to their authorization level. Administrative users should be able to assign, modify, and audit roles, ensuring compliance with internal security and privacy policies.

epics.title: Interaction History and Data Security
epics.summary: Maintain a secure history of user activities and data.
epics.description: Implement a complete audit trail mechanism that records all user interactions within the portal, including logins, transactions, and requests. Data must be encrypted both in transit and at rest, ensuring adherence to banking compliance standards and data privacy laws. Access to logs should be restricted to authorized personnel only.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Reliability
epics.summary: Ensure portal performance and system reliability.
epics.description: Optimize the portal’s performance by employing efficient caching, load balancing, and database indexing strategies. Conduct regular stress tests and implement monitoring tools to detect and resolve performance bottlenecks proactively. The system should ensure high availability, minimal downtime, and scalable architecture to support growth.

user_stories.title: Implement secure user login with MFA
user_stories.description: As a user, I want secure login with multi-factor authentication (MFA), so that my account is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support credentials, one-time passwords, and security questions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can log in using credentials and additional verification steps. 2. MFA must comply with industry standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registered user, when they attempt to log in, then they must provide additional MFA verification steps.

user_stories.title: Add password reset feature
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password, so that I can regain access if I forget it.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include secure methods for password reset.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can request a password reset. 2. User receives a secure link to reset the password.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they request a password reset, then they should receive a secure reset link.

user_stories.title: Implement session timeout
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my session to time out after a period of inactivity, so that my account remains secure.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User session times out after a set period of inactivity. 2. User is logged out and prompted to log in again.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when they are inactive for a defined duration, then their session should timeout and they should be logged out.

user_stories.title: Add device recognition feature
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the system to recognize my device, so that my login experience is smoother.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement device recognition with security checks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. System recognizes previously used devices. 2. User is prompted for less frequent MFA on recognized devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they log in from a recognized device, then they should experience a smoother login process with less frequent MFA prompts.

user_stories.title: Design a responsive user interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive interface that works on all devices, so that I have a seamless experience everywhere.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Follow accessibility guidelines, ensure a consistent theme, and provide clear navigation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The interface adapts to desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. 2. Navigation is clear and consistent.
user_stories.test_cases: Given any device, when accessing the interface, then it should adapt seamlessly and provide an intuitive navigation experience.

user_stories.title: Create a personalized dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant products and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Show products, services, and information based on user profile and eligibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays relevant content based on user profile. 2. Content adapts dynamically to user's banking relationship.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they access their dashboard, then it should display personalized products and services.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Implement streamlined account opening workflows
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a streamlined workflow for account opening, so that I can apply with minimal steps.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Minimize steps, validate inputs in real-time, and allow users to track progress.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Workflow minimizes necessary steps. 2. Real-time input validation is present.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they apply to open an account, then they should experience a streamlined workflow with real-time validation.

user_stories.title: Provide real-time status updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I know the current status at all times.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Send automated notifications at key milestones.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User receives real-time updates at submission, review, approval, or rejection.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user submission, when the status changes, then the user should receive a real-time update.

user_stories.epic_title: Document Upload and Application Draft Saving
user_stories.title: Enable document upload and draft saving
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload documents securely and save incomplete forms, so that I can complete applications later.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Secure upload, save partially completed forms in encrypted state.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can upload documents securely. 2. Partially completed forms are saved and encrypted.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when saved, then it should be stored securely and be accessible later.

user_stories.title: Integrate with core banking system
user_stories.description: As a user, I want seamless integration with the bank’s core systems, so that my data is consistent.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure real-time synchronization with minimal latency.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User data is synchronized in real-time. 2. Integration maintains data integrity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a transaction in the portal, when completed, then it should synchronize with the core banking system in real-time.

user_stories.title: Implement role-based access control
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to manage user roles, so that each user’s access is appropriate to their level.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Admin users can assign and audit roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Admin can assign, modify, and audit roles. 2. Users only access features relevant to their role.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an admin user, when managing roles, then they should be able to assign, modify, and audit roles.

user_stories.title: Maintain secure interaction history
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want a secure history of user activities, so that compliance and audits are maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Record all interactions with encryption, restrict access to logs.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. All user interactions are recorded securely. 2. Logs are accessible only to authorized personnel.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the need for an audit, when accessing logs, then logs must be encrypted and only available to authorized users.

user_stories.title: Ensure portal performance and reliability
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a reliable and fast portal, so that I have a consistent experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Performance optimization, regular stress tests, and scalable architecture.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Portal performance is optimized. 2. System reliability is maintained with minimal downtime.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an increase in user load, when accessing the portal, then it should perform efficiently without downtime.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture shows the banking self-service portal using various Azure services for frontend, authentication, backend services, database, integration, notifications, monitoring, security, access control, and DevOps, ensuring user-friendly design, security, and seamless integration.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address critical security and reliability gaps by adding a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and placeholder nodes for disaster recovery. All nodes and edges have been validated, and the structure adheres to ReactFlow standards with no missing or duplicate elements. The architecture now better aligns with Azure Well-Architected Framework principles, achieving a high-quality rating.
